CustomField.inlineHelpText: Percentage of the Sales Credit Amount depending on the Opportunity Stage. Prospecting = 6%, Introducing = 3%, Qualifying = 4%, Solutioning = 8%, Proposing = 8%, Negotiating = 10%, Awaiting QA = 100%, Information Needed = 100%, Closed Won = 100%.
CustomField.label: Probability Weighted Forecast
